abstract: The police are searching for a suspect linked to several sexual assaults in southeast Queens in the past month.
snippet: The police are searching for a suspect linked to several sexual assaults in southeast Queens in the past month.
lead_paragraph: A series of sexual assaults in southeastern Queens was identified on Saturday as a pattern of crimes that the police believe was committed by a single suspect.

headline.main: Police Seeking Suspect in Series of Sexual Assaults in Queens
